ComicInfo.Series: Red Sonja / Claw: The Devil's Hands
ComicInfo.Summary: Devil's Hands, Part 2: Soul Corruption: Red Sonja and Claw take refuge in a town just outside the walls of an enemy's castle. Betrayed, the two come under siege from the minions of an evil sorcerer from Red Sonja's past, who may also have clues to Claw's unbearable curse and how to end it.
ComicInfo.Title: Devil's Hands, Part 2: Soul Corruption
